EmailTemplate.subject: Step Forward Launches a New Pathway
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Marriott Hotels Want You!
Congratulations on making it to this stage of the Step Forward process. As you know, once you have attended a workshop, submitted your CV and Skills and Experience Survey you will be put forward for matching with our employers in your chosen pathway(s). However, we have some exciting news that we want to share with you...
We're proud to announce that Step Forward has partnered with Marriot Hotels to bring you a new Hospitality pathway!
We want to make sure that you don't miss out on this opportunity and have the chance to register your interest in this new pathway today.
Do you want to develop your skills in the largest hotel chain in the world? Looking for an opportunity with a clear route to management? Our hospitality pathway could be the right choice for you.
Tell me more.
As a Marriott Apprentice, your first year will be fully supported with training and guidance from Step Forward. You then have the opportunity to continue with Marriott for a career opportunity with a difference.
Year One
Receive world class training on the job and move into a supervisory role.
Year Two
Possibility to secure full-time employment, earn up to Â£14,000 and accelerate your career path.
Year Three
Potential to secure a job anywhere in the world in a Marriott Hotel
Yes please, what next?
If you're happy with your current pathways then there's nothing that you need to do.
However, if you would like to be considered for a hospitality role with Marriott you should register your interest in the pathway using the link below.
{!Step_Forward_Activity__c.TEMP_Link_to_Hospitality_Pathway_Form__c}
You will then be invited to a hospitality assessment. Our next assessments are happening soon so make sure to register your interest now.
www.stepforward.uk.com
